item.title: SoE Sophomores: Your Arch, Your Future: Don’t Let Missed Deadlines Hold You Back!
item.description: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM - West Hall Auditorium. Get the facts from SOE Advisors and the CCPD! Learn what you NEED to do for Arch to avoid common mistakes that can delay your degree. Learn how to be approved for Summer Away before it’s too late!

item.title: Open Office Hours with Lally Dean Wagman - Friday, February 21
item.description: Friday, February 21, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - Come meet Lally’s new Dean, Liad Wagman, at Open Office Hours! This is your chance to ask questions, share ideas, and get to know Dean Wagman in an informal setting. Open to all RPI students, regardless of major. Just drop in, no appointment needed!

item.title: Book Your Appointment with COMM+D Online!
item.description: Are you working on a writing assignment, oral presentation, or visual design project? Whether you’re at the beginning brainstorming stages or finishing up your final revisions, the Center for Global Communication+Design (Comm+D) can help, so be sure to schedule an appointment with a member of the Center’s trained staff!

item.title: McKinney Creative Writing Workshop to be Held 2/21
item.description: Have a story that could inspire others? Ready to raise your voice in solidarity with your community? Want to share your experiences with environmental or social activism? Get help composing or revising an essay, poem, or story for submission to the McKinney Writing for Social Change Contest with author and activist D. Colin on 2/21 at 12pm in the Fischbach Conference Room, on the second floor of the Folsom Library.

item.title: West Point on the March
item.description: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 7:00 PM - Join the West Point Band for “West Point on the March,” an exploration of the most classic American military musical genre: the march, featuring some of Sousa’s best-known works alongside lively selections like “Americans We” and Ethel Smyth’s anthem of women’s suffrage, “March of the Women.” For full description, visit https://webforms.rpi.edu/west-point-march. Free and open to the public.

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering 20% - 50% Off During Spring Art Sale
item.description: The Rensselaer Collegiate Store is currently hosting its Spring 2025 Art Sale from now through Saturday, June 28, 2025, with sale items available both in-store and online. While supplies last, customers can save 20% off select art supplies, 40% off select brushes, and 50% off paper and canvas! Note that this sale excludes clearance items, art kits, metals, and jewelry, and cannot be combined with other coupons or discounts.

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Leading from Anywhere”
item.description: Thursday, February 27, 2025 9:00 AM - 11:00 AM - At Rensselaer, we maintain that “leadership” involves a learnable set of actions and behaviors that is available to everyone. In this workshop, participants will explore the tenants that comprise everyday leadership and discuss the behaviors that define leadership not as positional or based on title, but rather on values and actions.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Seminar: "Listening in a Hectic World"-Part 1
item.description: Listening is a vehicle to get the information needed to accomplish work objectives. In today’s information-saturated work environment, everyone needs to be able to tune out the “noise” and tune in to what’s important. In this seminar, we explore a listening approach that balances the demands of getting the information that you need with the awareness that every interaction provides an opportunity to cement solid work relationships with others.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: TIAA to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling February 27
item.description: Thursday, February 27, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits. Consultations will be conducted in 60 minute increments. To schedule your individual retirement counseling, please call TIAA at 1-800-732-8353 or online.

item.title: Quick Learn Webinar - Creating Basic Pivot Tables with Excel for Windows
item.description:
Monday, February 24, 2025 1:30 PM - 2:00 PM - Do you work with data in Excel? Are you always manipulating the content with filters and sorting? If so, taking a look at Pivot Tables in Excel could be beneficial. In the webinar we will focus on using Pivot Tables in Excel to summarize, filter and group data. Register here for the webinar.
